reviews.review:
Good Game


Edit: This game fucking sucks

Let's face it this is a great game.  The fact that the game is free to play makes it unplayable.  Cheaters EVERYWHERE.  Valve stopped caring, they only care about their bottom line.  Fuck this game, play Rust or Tarkov instead.
Mucho hack mucho hack demasiado hack
classic game, the gateway game for FPS.

I personally love this game, the community can be somewhat toxic at times but there are awesome people to meet that make up for it. overall 9.9/10

it good yes play this with ur dog

This game is full of hackers and its useless if you dont have prime like honestly this game went from good to shit because of  them making the game free to play, also this games ranking system is so bad. Even if you win like 10 matches, you dont get a rankup , you lose like 2-3 games and you lose the rank

Все очень круто жаль что я не киберспорт и не даю в попу
我很喜欢这个游戏。但是开小号虐菜的人非常多，导致每一个段位的游戏体验都不好，希望能有效限制小号玩家，让他们回到自己应有的地方去，还每一个段位一片公平竞争的净土。
Great game to play with friends!
Nothing wrong with the gameplay, but the bottom 4 ranked divisions (Silver 1-4) Are full of kids just trolling and griefing and they never get punished for it and ruin everyones experience.
